message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the value and uniqueness of the item. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1400000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I cannot go above $1450000 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable going below $1550000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between our previous offers. Would you consider $1525000?
Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Given my financial constraints, I would like to propose $1500000 as the final offer for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
I'm not willing to go below $1500000, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you halfway between our last offers. Would you consider $1512500?
Alice, I've considered your latest offer carefully. Unfortunately, I am unable to agree to $1512500. My final offer remains at $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
